Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma said India's familiarity with conditions in New York does not count as an advantage over Pakistan.
Rohit Sharma mentioned that the pitch curator was confused about how the track will play; how much grass to remove or leave on.
Rohit Sharma stated that the team does not know what pitch they will get, and how it will play.
Rohit Sharma emphasized that experience counts in difficult conditions, and the team needs to be mentally tough.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rohit Sharma revealed that Rishabh Pant's elevation to the number three spot was to get a southpaw in the middle to bat freely, take on attacks, and play maximum deliveries.
Rohit Sharma mentioned that besides the openers, none of the other positions are fixed, and the team will be flexible with their batting order.
